mapper.insert: insert into jintie_model_list (id, custom_key, model_id, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, remarks1, remarks2, remarks3, remarks4, remarks5, remarks6, remarks7, remarks8, remarks9, remarks10) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custom_key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{create_user,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_user,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks10,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update jintie_model_list set custom_key = #{custom_key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_id = #{model_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{update_user,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks3 = #{remarks3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks4 = #{remarks4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks5 = #{remarks5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks6 = #{remarks6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks7 = #{remarks7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks8 = #{remarks8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks9 = #{remarks9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks10 = #{remarks10,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, custom_key, model_id, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, remarks1, remarks2, remarks3, remarks4, remarks5, remarks6, remarks7, remarks8, remarks9, remarks10 from jintie_model_list where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, custom_key, model_id, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, remarks1, remarks2, remarks3, remarks4, remarks5, remarks6, remarks7, remarks8, remarks9, remarks10 from jintie_model_list
mapper.update: update jintie_model_list set custom_key = #{custom_key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{update_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks3 = #{remarks3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks4 = #{remarks4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks5 = #{remarks5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks6 = #{remarks6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks7 = #{remarks7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks8 = #{remarks8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks9 = #{remarks9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks10 = #{remarks10,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where model_id = #{model_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, custom_key, model_id, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, remarks1, remarks2, remarks3, remarks4, remarks5, remarks6, remarks7, remarks8, remarks9, remarks10 from jintie_model_list where model_id = #{model_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update jintie_model_list set remarks3 = '已删除' where model_id = #{model_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
